      • isDisengaging

        public boolean isDisengaging(Combatant c,
                             BattleState s)
        To avoid having to implement attacks-of-opporutnity gonna simply prohibit that anything that would cause an aoo is simply prohibited. since the game is more fluid with movement/turns now this shouldn't be a problem. Disengaging is simply forcing a 5-foot step to avoid aoo as per the core rules.
